// src/components/FAQ.js import React from "react"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import "./FAQ.css"; export default function FAQ() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{t("faq_title")} — InstantSaver {/* Open Graph */}

Can I use this tool on mobile?

Yes, InstantSaver works perfectly on Android and iOS devices. No app needed.

Do you store my downloads?

No. We never store or track what you download. All links are processed in real-time and deleted.

{t("faq_title")}
